title: COUNTING MIRACLES
author: Nicholas Sparks
description: A man in search of the father he never knew encounters a single mom and rumors circulate of the nearby appearance of a white deer.

title: INTERMEZZO
author: Sally Rooney
description: After the passing of their father, seemingly different brothers engage in relationships and seek ways to cope.

title: THE WOMEN
author: Kristin Hannah
description: In 1965, a nursing student follows her brother to serve during the Vietnam War and returns to a divided America.

title: HERE ONE MOMENT
author: Liane Moriarty
description: Passengers on a short and seemingly unremarkable flight learn how and when they are going to die.

title: PLAYGROUND
author: Richard Powers
description: Residents of an island in French Polynesia must vote on whether to send floating cities out onto the open sea.

title: IRON FLAME
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training might require her to betray the man she loves.

title: THE LIFE IMPOSSIBLE
author: Matt Haig
description: A retired math teacher who inherits a run-down house on a Mediterranean island from a friend goes in search of answers.

title: SOMEWHERE BEYOND THE SEA
author: TJ Klune
description: The second book in the Cerulean Chronicles series. The headmaster of a strange orphanage seeks to protect the magical children who reside there.

title: TELL ME EVERYTHING
author: Elizabeth Strout
description: As a murder casts a pall on a town in Maine, Lucy Barton, Olive Kitteridge and Bob Burgess share stories and seek meaning.

title: THE NIGHT WE LOST HIM
author: Laura Dave
description: Estranged siblings look into the death of their hotel magnate father and uncover a family secret.

title: THE GAMES GODS PLAY
author: Abigail Owen
description: Gods enlist mortals to fight in their stead to determine who will sit on the throne in Olympus.

title: THE GOD OF THE WOODS
author: Liz Moore
description: When a 13-year-old girl disappears from an Adirondack summer camp in 1975, secrets kept by the Van Laar family emerge.

title: WE SOLVE MURDERS
author: Richard Osman
description: When a dead body and a bag of money turn up on a remote island, Amy Wheeler reaches out to her retired father-in-law to help investigate.

title: THE BUTCHER GAME
author: Alaina Urquhart
description: The second book in the Dr. Wren Muller series. A serial killer wants to settle a score with a forensic pathologist.

title: BY ANY OTHER NAME
author: Jodi Picoult
description: A young woman’s play about her ancestor Emilia Bassano, who wrote Shakespeare’s works, is submitted to a festival under a male pseudonym.
